channel.title: How to implement new skill interface? And how to fix my experience hover
channel.description: Hey guys i could use some help putting in a new skill interface that doesn't have summoning and dungeoneering considering i am going to be taking those skills out of my client and server. And also i have a problem with my experience hover i do believe.
